about_the_game:
God Simulator is an Economic Strategy-Simulation Game, putting you in charge of, well, the entire world!

Become an omnipotent observer in this holyrious adventure and decide the fate of all those who inhabit the world, through a powerful control panel that receives everyone’s prayers. What kind of God will you become - will you hear their pleas and pilot this planet to a paramount of peacefulness or will you take a step back, letting Earth erode into ultimate chaos?

You’re the one playing God so, the choice is yours!

How would Earth look if You Were in Charge?


Decide whether to help individuals and communities, choose who to reward and punish, and ponder who to let off the hook! Will you let an overworked employee get away with drunk driving? Will you help a starving village by gifting them fresh new resources? Will the world’s faith in you grow or vanish?

Millions of Notifications!


With so many prayers hitting your DMs from across the globe, who do you choose to help? Learn more about the hard-working people and tribes, and deranged individuals begging for forgiveness, as civilizations from all walks of life will look up to you for help.

This is Crowd Control to Major God


Keep up-to-date with the latest prayers from around the world through Region Preview, track your prayer progress with Situation Overview, and pay attention to the charts and graphs as they indicate your Godly Gratitude (if you get any!).

White Robes or Spiky Horns?


Choose from a range of unique character models, or mix and match to create your own Stylistic God - from Egyptian and Greek mythology to the more traditional white-robes style. Hell, did someone say Satan?!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7x64 / Windows 8.1x64 / Windows 10x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.5 Ghz or AMD Phenom II 2.6 Ghz or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB & AMD 5570 or nVidia 450 or Intel Integrated Graphics 530
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7x64 / Windows 8.1x64 / Windows 10x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.5 Ghz or AMD Phenom II 2.6 Ghz or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB & AMD 5570 or nVidia 450 or Intel Integrated Graphics 530
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device
